name: Quiz Bang
overview: A quiz game published in FunFour and Loadstar #162. This is a blend of trivia with arcade action to give you a game unlike what you've seen before. This game is perfect for those that like the knowledge testing games but don't like taking turns being quizzed by a dull taskmaster. Two players compete in the challenge each trying to get as many questions as possible and then to answer them correctly. Each player can use a joystick, or user\port 1 can be keyboard and port 2 joystick. You can choose to have the correct answers show when you guess incorrectly or not. Player 1 is always on the left for the sake of gameplay. First hit the rising balloons with your arrows, each balloon hit is a chance at another trivia question. This game is a part of the Loadstar FunFour game pack.
